text: thumb|right|200px| Kevin Shinick (19 March, 1969, Merrick, New York) is a voice actor, screenwriter and producer. He won an Emmy Award in 2010 for Outstanding Short-Format Animated Program for Robot Chicken. Shenick is the creator, voice actor and producer of the comedy series Mad (TV series). He was also a writer for Robot Chicken. == References == Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American voice actors Category:American television producers Category:American television writers Category:1969 births Category:Living people
title: Kevin Shinick
